title: Channa masala (Chickpea curry)
ingredients: ['2 tomatoes, diced', '1 onion, chopped', '1 (2.5cm) piece fresh root ginger, peeled and roughly chopped', '1 tablespoon rice flour', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '2 (400g) tins chickpeas, rinsed and drained', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh coriander']
